reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Professional ice breaker
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this product to use in a meeting for an icebreaker at work. I wasn’t expecting high-quality, but was shocked when I received the delivery. The pieces are sturdy and there is an ample amount of each type. If using this as a toy, be careful as there are definitely small pieces so age Definitely should be a factor considered

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great activity for kids. My granddaughter's four years old and I bought it for her for Christmas. She sits and she likes it and her father likes it too. They're both entertained

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great building set
reviews.reviewText: The kids love building with this kit. Endless options for them. Things to consider, the case won't hold all of the pieces unless you spend a lot of time working on organizing them and there are SO many pieces (ND some are tiny) that pick up can be a chore. They tend to scatter everywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the many sets of these I have purchased for my kindergarten classroom. I keep adding to the box that I have because my students are so creative with what they can build and they wanted even more pieces. Other teachers in my building borrow these from me, and my class is always so excited to get them back. Buy these and watch your children be creative builders!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Five stars for effort. BUT...
reviews.reviewText: But this is a big box of colored straws lol. It's a good concept on paper and in the picture but in reality not really a practical kids toy that they'll use for more than a day or two based on my gifting experience. It's literally a lot of straws.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as big as picture shows
reviews.reviewText: These are actually super small for what the picture shows! There's no way to build a rocket like that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought as a gift for niece/nephew - now my kids want their own!
reviews.reviewText: Bought it as a gift earlier this year for my niece and nephew. I've heard they love to play with it and it occupies them for hours (they are 9 and 4). My kids have played with it at their house multiple times and were BEGGING me for it for Christmas. Lucky for us, Santa brought it for them and they seem to play with it more than most of their other toys. Love seeing their imaginations go wild building!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comes in a great storage box
reviews.reviewText: My daughter opened these up today. She loved them right away. There are so many cool designs that can be built with these. It is going to be fun watching what she comes up with.
